alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 5:43AM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations of a glaze up to a quarter of an inch are possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph and quickly dropping temperatures could lead to rapid freezing potential on area roadways Thursday into Thursday evening. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. Portions of central, east central, south central, and southwest Missouri. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
